overview: Planet Earth is in peril! Scattered throughout the globe are a horde of giant intergalactic insects. a mad scientist with a legion of city-crushing monsters, a group of thuggish rouges, and a band of Heroes determined to protect humanity. When these rival groups clash, cityscapes crumble, bystanders are crushed, and monsters fight to the death... or at least until Referee Jingi declares a winner!
title: Kaiju Big Battel
